column4: ASULutzy- Do you mean I simply use the recover console, and then "passwd"?
Is recovery console available for everyone? I mean... isn't that even more dangerous that having to use an external tool for Windows in order to reset its SAM file...?
typically, if a user has physical access to your machine, it's more or less assumed that there's a way to root it
barring things like encrypted filesystems, etc
